name: Add or update Mailchimp subscribers from a custom webhook
description: Effortlessly manage your email marketing subscribers with this template! Every time a custom webhook is triggered, Make will automatically add or update a subscriber in your Mailchimp list. This integration ensures that your subscriber information is always up-to-date, allowing you to maintain effective communication and engagement with your audience. Perfect for businesses looking to streamline their email marketing efforts and enhance their subscriber management process.
